resources.string: Screen. In this option you place a piece of paper on the screen of the device. The light from the screen will allow you to see the image through the paper. \nCamera. In this option the image is on top of the view from the deviceâ€™s camera. The camera view will allow you to see the paper with the image on top when using the app.
The app requires access to your camera. This will allow you to trace an image using your camera.
